meanings.definition: The period of rest between two halves of a game or performance.
meanings.sent1: During the halftimes, the players took a break and rehydrated.
meanings.sent2: The halftimes of the football game allowed the audience to grab snacks.
meanings.sent3: At the halftimes, the mascot entertained the crowd with a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The halftimes felt like a brief intermission in the intense match.
meanings.sent5: The halftimes were a welcome pause in the action-packed game.
